ingredients.content: 32 oz boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into pieces (1-1½ in.)
¼ tsp dried red chili flakes, to taste

preparations.content: Place a large bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in orange juice, sesame oil, soy sauce and corn starch and whisk to combine. Weigh in chicken and stir to combine. Refrigerate and allow to marinate 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.

Place marmalade, chicken stock, soy sauce, orange juice, cooking wine, corn starch and chili flakes into mixing bowl and without measuring cup cook <b>7 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place water into mixing bowl. Place simmering basket onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in rice. Remove simmering basket and rinse rice under cold running water until water runs clear. Insert simmering basket with rinsed rice into mixing bowl. Set Varoma dish into position, add marinated chicken, secure Varoma lid and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Remove Varoma and set aside. Remove simmering basket with spatula, transfer rice to a bowl and keep warm. Drain cooked chicken and set aside. Discard cooking water and rinse mixing bowl.

Place reserved drained chicken, reserved glaze, sugar snap peas and sesame seeds into mixing bowl and without measuring cup cook <b>3 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Garnish with sliced green onions or garlic chives and serve with reserved cooked rice.
